item.title: A good woodcutter
item.dc:creator: @Penguins Penguins
item.description:
@Penguins wrote:

[code]{--------------------------------------------------------------------]
| A WhiteShadow Productions |
[--------------------------------------------------------------------] | NAME : PowerChopper |
| CATEGORY : Woodcutting |
| AUTOCOLOR : Yes |
| MSN CONTACT : redshadowsx@hotmail.com |
| SRL VER. : 2.40 |
±------------------------[Description]------------------------------+
| Chops a full load of logs(tree, oak, or willow) then drops it. |
| Compatible to chop anywhere! |
±------------------------[Instructions]-----------------------------+
| 1. Use Runescape Client, world w/ less players in it. |
| 2. Put all players in the area with the tree type. |
| 3. Drag crosshair to Runescape client, then press play. |
| 4. Form[s] will pop up, fill it out. Very User friendly. |
±--------------------------[Other]----------------------------------+
| *You may not distribute this script! Report bugs to me |
[--------------------------------------------------------------------}

program PowerChopper;
{.include SRL/SRL.Scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.Scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.Scar}

const
StartPlayer = 0;//first player to play.

var
frmDesign2 : TForm;
Label1, Label2, Label3, Label4, Label5 : TLabel;
Button2 : TButton;
Edit1, Edit2 : TEdit;
ComboBox1, ComboBox2 : TComboBox;

var
TreeColor : array [0…3] of Integer;
ClickWait, Loads, LogMask, L0ad, LogColor : Integer;
TreeText, DropA11 : String;
TreeTalk : array[0…28] of String;
TreeReply : array[0…25] of String;

procedure LogBack; forward;

procedure VarsSetUp(Sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign2.ModalResult:= mrOk;
TreeText :=ComboBox1.text;
ClickWait:=(StrToInt(Edit1.text));
CurrentPlayer:= StartPlayer;
Loads :=(strToInt(Edit2.text));
DropA11 :=ComboBox2.text;
end;

procedure InitForm2;
begin
frmDesign2:= CreateForm;
frmDesign2.Left := 250;
frmDesign2.Top := 115;
frmDesign2.Width:= 277;
frmDesign2.Height := 276;
frmDesign2.Caption := ‘PowerChopper’;
frmDesign2.Color := clBtnFace ;
frmDesign2.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign2.Font.Height := -11 ;
frmDesign2.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign2.Font.Style:= [];
frmDesign2.Visible:= False;
frmDesign2.PixelsPerInch:= 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label1.Left := 6;
Label1.Top := 34;
Label1.Width := 53;
Label1.Height := 14;
Label1.Caption := ‘Tree Type’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label2.Left := 6;
Label2.Top := 63;
Label2.Width := 43;
Label2.Height := 14;
Label2.Caption := ‘DropAll?’;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label3.Left := 6;
Label3.Top :=104;
Label3.Width := 30;
Label3.Height := 14;
Label3.Caption := ‘Loads’;
Label4 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label4.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label4.Left :=6;
Label4.Top :=134;
Label4.Width := 52;
Label4.Height := 14;
Label4.Caption := ‘Wait/Click’;
Label5 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign2);
Label5.Parent := frmDesign2;
Label5.Left :=30;
Label5.Top :=210;
Label5.Width := 52;
Label5.Height := 14;
Label5.Caption := 'By : WhiteShadow ';
Button2 := TButton.Create(frmDesign2);
Button2.Onclick:=@VarsSetup;
Button2.Parent := frmDesign2;
Button2.Left := 61;
Button2.Top := 171;
Button2.Width := 116;
Button2.Height := 25;
Button2.Caption := ‘Start Script’;
Button2.TabOrder := 11;
ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign2);
ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign2;
ComboBox1.Left := 65;
ComboBox1.Top := 32;
ComboBox1.Width := 150;
ComboBox1.Height := 21;
ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
ComboBox1.TabOrder := 12;
ComboBox1.Text := ‘Tree’;
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Tree’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Oak’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Willow’);
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign2);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign2;
Edit1.Left := 64;
Edit1.Top := 131;
Edit1.Width := 148;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 10;
Edit1.Text := ‘3000’;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign2);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign2;
Edit2.Left := 64;
Edit2.Top := 100;
Edit2.Width := 149;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 11;
Edit2.Text := ‘1’;
ComboBox2 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign2);
ComboBox2.Parent := frmDesign2;
ComboBox2.Left := 64;
ComboBox2.Top := 64;
ComboBox2.Width := 148;
ComboBox2.Height := 21;
ComboBox2.ItemHeight := 13;
ComboBox2.TabOrder := 9;
ComboBox2.Text := ‘Save Random Items’;
ComboBox2.Items.Add(‘Save Random Items’);
ComboBox2.Items.Add(‘Drop all(not axe)’);
end;

procedure SafeInitForm2;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm2’, v);
end;

function ShowFormModal2 : Boolean;
begin
Result:= False;
if(frmDesign2.ShowModal = mrOk)then
Result:= True;
end;

function SafeShowFormModal2: Boolean;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
result:= ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal2’, v);
end;

//inChat
function InChat2(Text : String) : Boolean;
begin
if(pos(Text, TheLine) <> 0)then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Text’);
Result := True;
end;
end;

//By Fawki!, edited verses *aka WT-Fakawi, Fakawi, Fawki
procedure WcRespond; //PotatoeResponder.
var
TheResponce : String;
begin
Writeln(‘WcRespond’);
OldLine := TheLine;
TheName := lowercase(trim(GetTextAtEx(20, 415, 45, SmallChars, False, False, 0, 2, 0, 40, True, tr_NormalChars)));
TheLine := lowercase(trim(GetTextAtEx(20, 415, 45, SmallChars, False, False, 0, 2, 16711680, 40, False, tr_NormalChars)));
NewLine := TheLine;
if(OldLine <> NewLine)then
if(pos(‘yo’, TheName) <> 0) or (pos(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, TheName) <> 0) then
begin
end else
begin
WriteFileString(TheFile,TheTime+’ '+ TheName + ‘’ + TheLine + chr(13));
if(inChat2(‘woodc’)) or (inChat2(‘wc’)) and (inChat2(‘lvl’)) or (inChat2(‘lev’)) then
begin
TheResponce := IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘woodcutting’));
SendText(TheResponce + ’ ’ + TheName)
GameTab(4);
end;
if(inChat2(‘drop’)) or (inChat2(‘wat’)) or (inChat2(‘doin’))then
begin
TheResponce := TreeReply[random(5)];
SendText(TheResponce);
end;
if(inChat2(‘lol’)) or (inChat2(‘lmao’)) or (InChat2(‘rofl’))then
begin
TheResponce:= TreeReply[random(5)+ 6];
SendText(TheResponce + ’ ‘+TheName);
end;
if(inChat2(Players[CurrentPlayer].Name)) or (InChat2(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick))then
begin
TheResponce:= TreeReply[random(6)+ 12];
SendText(TheResponce +’ '+TheName);
end;
if(inChat2(‘hi’)) or (inChat(‘hello’)) or (inChat(‘hey’))then
begin
TheResponce:= TreeReply[random(6) + 19]
SendText(TheResponce);
end;
end;
Writeln(‘End WcRespond’);
end;

procedure LoadColor(Tree : String);
begin
case Tree of
‘Tree’ :
begin
TreeColor[0]:= 931888;
TreeColor[1]:= 2181184;
TreeColor[2]:= 806976;
TreeColor[3]:= 5 //Tolerance.
end;
‘Oak’ :
begin
TreeColor[0]:= 4624512;
TreeColor[1]:= 3041368;
TreeColor[2]:= 4161648;
TreeColor[3]:= 10 //Tolerance.
end;
‘Willow’ :
begin
TreeColor[0]:= 2179128;
TreeColor[1]:= 3829856;
TreeColor[2]:= 1982520;
TreeColor[3]:= 10 //Tolerance.
end;
end;
end;

procedure AntiBann;
begin
BoredEvery(8 + random(5));
end;

procedure Prearrange;
begin
if(not(LoggedIn))then Exit;
FindAxeHeadColor;
if(random(2) = 1)then
begin
SetChat(‘off’, 2);
end;
SetChat(‘on’, 1);
SetChat(‘on’, 1);
FixChat;
HighestAngle;
end;

function NoAxe : Boolean;
begin
if(IsChatMessage(‘need an axe’)) or (IsChatMessage(‘have an axe’))then
begin
Writeln(‘No Axe’);
Result:= True;
end else
begin
Result:= False;
end;
end;

procedure Report;
var
i : Integer;
Active : String;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(’<---------------------PowerChopper--------------------->’);
Writeln(’ Worked For ‘+ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln(’ Logged In ‘+IntToStr(Logs)+’ time[s]’);
Writeln(’ Dropped ‘+IntToStr(L0ad)+ ’ load[s]’);
for i:= 0 to HowManyPlayers - 1 do
begin
if(Players[i].Active = True)then
Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
Writeln(’[+]---------------------------------------------------[+]’);
Writeln(’ ‘+Players[i].Name+’, ‘+’ Wc lvl : ‘+IntToStr(Players[i].Level[20])+ ‘, Loads : ‘+IntToStr(Players[i].Banked)+’, Chopped : ‘+IntToStr(Players[i].Integer1)+’ ‘+treetext+’[s]’);
Writeln(’ xp gained : ‘+FloatToStr(Players[i].Extended1) + ‘, Worked : ‘+InTtoStr(Players[i].Worked)+ ’ mins[s]’+’ Active : ‘+Active);
end;
Writeln(’<------------------------------------------------------>’);
end;

procedure EntAxe;
var
f : Integer;
begin
for f:=0 to 2 do
begin
FindEnt(TreeColor[f]);
end;
WcRespond;
AntiBann;
if(not(FindHead))then
begin
Writeln(‘Could not fix axe’);
repeat
LogOut;
Wait(2000);
until(FindLoginScreen) or (not(LoggedIn))
end;
if(NoAxe)then
begin
Writeln(‘Axe broke, so sorry’);
repeat
LogOut;
Wait(2000);
until(not(LoggedIn)) or (FindLoginScreen)
end;
end;

procedure MeSpeaks;
begin
if(random(25) = 1)then
begin
Writeln(‘AutoTalking’);
TypeSend(TreeTalk[random(28)]);
end;
end;

procedure JackEx(Movement : Boolean);
begin
if(NOnewboxes > 2)then
begin
LogOut;
Exit;
end;
EntAxe;
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
if(WeAreDead)then
LogOut;
end;
if(MoveMent)then
MeSpeaks;
end;

procedure PhraseLoader;
begin
TreeTalk[0]:= ‘chopp chopp’;
TreeTalk[1]:= ‘i am going to get lvl 99 wc’;
TreeTalk[2]:= ‘sigh, i feel bored’;
TreeTalk[3]:= ‘ents are evil’;
TreeTalk[4]:= ‘i hate when my axe head falls off’;
TreeTalk[5]:= ‘lewllawl’;
TreeTalk[6]:= ‘stupid tree’;
TreeTalk[7]:= ‘chopper is i’;
TreeTalk[8]:= TreeText +’ is easy to cut a load of’;
TreeTalk[9]:= ‘lol, lol’;
TreeTalk[10]:= ‘timber’;
TreeTalk[11]:= ‘ok…’;
TreeTalk[12]:= ‘hello’;
TreeTalk[13]:= ‘my wc is about to lvl’;
TreeTalk[14]:= TreeText + ’ respawns fast’;
TreeTalk[15]:= ‘taste my axe’;
TreeTalk[16]:= ‘o0o0o’;
TreeTalk[17]:= ‘greeny trees’;
TreeTalk[18]:= ‘wc lvls anyone xd’;
TreeTalk[19]:= ‘i r teh leetest noob’;
TreeTalk[20]:= ‘i just be chopping away’;
TreeTalk[21]:= ‘i drop what i chop because it is faster to lvl’;
TreeTalk[22]:= ‘chop…drop, my boring day.’;
TreeTalk[23]:= ‘somebody give me a rune axe’;
TreeTalk[24]:= ‘whack, chop, cut…’;
TreeTalk[25]:= ‘selling ‘+Treetext+’ 1k ea log’;
TreeTalk[26]:= ‘must get to lvl 60’;
TreeTalk[27]:= ‘yews = money’;
TreeTalk[28]:= ‘lvl faster plz’;

TreeReply[0]:= ‘i am chopping ‘+TreeText+’ duh.’; //wat are you doing?
TreeReply[1]:= ‘it is faster to lvl when you just drop it everywhere’;
TreeReply[2]:= ‘chop drop, what else!’;
TreeReply[3]:= ‘this is kind of fun, me chopperz’;
TreeReply[4]:= ‘me, is chopping away’;
TreeReply[5]:= 'i ‘+Players[CurrentPlayer].Name+’ is chopping '+TreeText;

TreeReply[6]:= ‘lol? haha’; //to lol type stuff
TreeReply[7]:= ‘roflcopter’;
TreeReply[8]:= ‘rofllmao’;
TreeReply[9]:= ‘ya haha’;
TreeReply[10]:= ‘lolerskates’;
TreeReply[11]:= ‘xD’;

TreeReply[12]:= ‘stfu’; //to your own name
TreeReply[13]:= ‘wat noob’;
TreeReply[14]:= ‘stop it’;
TreeReply[15]:= ‘public chat is now off’;
TreeReply[16]:= ‘hmm… your annoying’;
TreeReply[17]:= ‘quit it, it is irritateing’;
TreeReply[18]:= ‘cant i play in peace…’;

TreeReply[19]:= ‘yo’; //to hi
TreeReply[20]:= ‘hey’;
TreeReply[21]:= ‘hi’;
TreeReply[23]:= ‘Suppy’;
TreeReply[24]:= ‘heyar’;
TreeReply[25]:= ‘hello’;
end;

procedure MouseHuman(zx, zy, rx, ry : Integer);
begin
if(random(5) = 1)then
MouseBack(zx, zy, rx, ry, 20, 50, 1)
else
Mouse(zx, zy, rx, ry, true);
end;

procedure NextColor;
begin
if(Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1 = 0)then //means first time login
begin
MMouseItem(random(27) + 1);
if(Option2(‘ogs’))then
begin
GetMousePos(x, y);
LogColor:= GetColor(x, y);
end else
begin
MMouseItem(random(27) + 1); //do twice just incase.
if(Option2(‘ogs’))then
begin
GetMousePos(x, y);
LogColor:= GetColor(x, y);
end;
end;
if(LogColor = 65536)then //black.
begin
MMouseItem(random(27) + 1);
if(Option2(‘ogs’))then
begin
GetMousePos(x, y);
LogColor:= GetColor(x, y);
end else
begin
MMouseItem(random(27) + 1);
if(Option2(‘ogs’))then
begin
GetMousePos(x, y);
LogColor:= GetColor(x, y);
end;
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure AutoCut;
var
tx, ty : Integer;
begin
Wait(1000 + random(1000));
repeat
if(FindObj3(tx, ty, TreeText, TreeColor[0], TreeColor[3]))or
(FindObj3(tx, ty, TreeText, TreeColor[1], TreeColor[3]))or
(FindObj3(tx, ty, TreeText, TreeColor[2], TreeColor[3]))then
begin
tx:= tx + random(2);
ty:= ty + random(2);
JackEx(True);
MouseHuman(tx, ty, 2, 2);
Flag;
if(NoAxe = True)then
begin
Writeln(‘Axe is jacked up’);
LogOut;
Exit;
end;
if(random(2) = 1)then
begin
WWait(ClickWait + random(1000));
end else
begin
Wait(ClickWait + random(1000));
end;
end; //not find tree.
if(not(LoggedIn)) and (FindLoginScreen)then
begin
Writeln(‘not logged in, probably no trees.’);
Exit;
end;
LogBack;
JackEx(True);
if(NoAxe = True)then
begin
Writeln(‘Axe is jacked up’);
LogOut;
Exit;
end;
until(InvFull) and (InventoryCount = 28)
end;

procedure CountLogs;
var
LogT : Extended;
DobLog : Integer;
begin
if(LoggedIn)then
NextColor;
DobLog:= CountItemColorTol(LogColor, 5);
if(DobLog > 28)then
DobLog:= 28;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1 + DobLog;
LogT:= GetTreeExp(TreeText);
Players[CurrentPlayer].Extended1:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Extended1 + Players[CurrentPlayer].Integer1 * LogT;
end;

procedure LoadMe;
begin
LogMask:= BitmapFromString(32, 26, ‘z78DAED988B1500200445’ +
‘573285FD476A0347A95CE52DE08AFC4472A4A604293F21CD8B599’ +
‘EBDFC1AD6697F69718CDB25646084A1F97FCE9F37F8D7AA2EAD0F’ +
‘56EC77FE88F0C9EDD76EFEE66FFE8AE46FF0D3BC88EC113777D29’ +
‘B9BEFAE692A7732F1DB25DF13EC1F54A51A54B9D8F035006E30D4’ +
‘02’); //Default log shape mask.
end;

procedure DropLogs;
var
StartSpeed : Integer;
L0gX, L0gY : Integer;
begin
StartSpeed:= MouseSpeed;
MouseSpeed:= 5 + random(2);
Writeln(‘Start dropping’);
repeat
JackEx(True);
if(FindBitmapMaskTolerance(LogMask, L0gX, L0gY, Mix1, Miy1, Mix2, Miy2, 10, 10))then
begin
L0gX:= L0gX + 2;
L0gy:= L0gY + 2;
Wait(50 + random(20));
Mouse(L0gX + 7, L0gY + 8, 3, 2, False);
ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Drop’);
Wait(800 + random(200));
end;
until(not(FindBitmapMaskTolerance(LogMask, L0gX, L0gY, Mix1, Miy1, Mix2, Miy2, 10, 10)))
MouseSpeed:= StartSpeed;
Writeln(‘End Dropping’);
end;

procedure DropInv;
var
Start : Integer;
begin
Start:= MouseSpeed;
MouseSpeed:= 6 + random(5);
if(EquipAxe)then
begin
DropTo(1, 14);
JackEx(True);
DropTo(15, 28);
end else
begin
DropTo(2, 14);
JackEx(True);
DropTo(15, 28);
end;
MouseSpeed:= Start;
end;

procedure Dropper;
begin
if(DropA11 = ‘Save Random Items’) and (LoggedIn)then
begin
try
DropLogs;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked + 1
L0ad:= L0ad + 1;
except
Writeln(‘Omit Runtime error’);
DropInv;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked + 1
L0ad:= L0ad + 1;
end;
end;
if(DropA11 = ‘Drop all(not axe)’) and (LoggedIn)then
begin
DropInv;
Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked:= Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked + 1
L0ad:= L0ad + 1;
end;
end;

procedure IdleOut;
begin
MarkTime(Mark);
SetChat(‘off’, 1);
Writeln(‘IdleOut’);
repeat
Wait(1000 + random(500));
JackEx(False);
if(TimeFromMark(Mark) > 120000)then
begin
LogOut;
Wait(1000 + random(1000));
Break;
end;
until(not(LoggedIn)) or (FindLoginScreen)
end;

procedure LogBack;
var
ClickHereToPlay, CHx, CHy, TMark : Integer;
begin
ClickHereToPlay := BitmapFromString(33, 1, ‘z78DA758E510E80300843’ +
‘AF54C0E2F6E94CB8FF9134123392693FFA41FA4A23A6F0888443D’ +
‘26DC000A7DCE7F458F23EE444E721444B6A0F53D58FE44F4365B7’ +
‘067D37AC3D95AADF2F50962C79’);
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(ClickHereToPlay, CHx, CHy, 250, 270, 530, 390, 5))then
begin
Mouse(CHx, CHy, 50, 20, True);
MarkTime(TMark);
Writeln(‘Found Click Here To Play’);
repeat
Wait(1000);
if(TimeFromMark(TMark) > 10000)then Exit;
until(LoggedIn)
Wait(2000 + random(1000));
end;
end;

procedure Commenx0r;
begin
SetUpPlayers;
SafeInitForm2;
SafeShowFormModal2;
SetUpSRL;
ClearDebug;
ActivateClient;
LoadColor(TreeText);
if(not(LoggedIn))then
begin
LoginPlayer;
end else
begin
NickNameBMP:= CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick,UpChars);
end;
end;

begin
Commenx0r;
LoadMe;
PhraseLoader;
Report;
repeat
Prearrange;
GameTab(4);
if(LoggedIn)then
Wait(1000 + random(1000));
AutoCut;
CountLogs;
Dropper;
if(Loggedin) and (Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked mod Loads = 0) then
begin
Players[CurrentPlayer].level[20]:= GetSkillLevel(‘woodcutting’);
GameTab(4);
Report;
if(random(2) = 1)then
begin
IdleOut;
NextPlayer(True);
Wait(1500 + random(1000));
end else
begin
LogOut;
NextPlayer(True);
Wait(1500 + random(1000));
end;
end;
if(not(Loggedin))then
NextPlayer(False);
Wait(1500 + random(1000));
until(False)
end.
[/code]

There you are

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @blah000 blah000
item.description:
@blah000 wrote:

I need an SRL power cutter that cuts normal trees, oaks and willows and does multiple accounts
